solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean isValidSerialization(String preorder) {--newline--        String[] nodes = preorder.split(",");--newline--        int diff = 1;--newline--        for (String node: nodes) {--newline--            if (--diff < 0) return false;--newline--            if (!node.equals("#")) diff += 2;--newline--        }--newline--        return diff == 0;--newline--    }--newline--}
